nodes.text: Unknown Soldier: The Story of General Grievous

Unknown Soldier: The Story of General Grievous is an article appearing in Star Wars Insider 86. It details the backstory and life of General Grievous. Abel G. Peña wrote the article, while Joe Corroney provided original illustrations.
The article is accompanied by a Hyperspace supplemental article also written by Peña: The Story of General Grievous: Lord of War.
